item.title: 023-20230315-EscapingTheCave
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We are working our way through the water passage in the cave We swim for a full day Fionea, puss, tia, don’t hear anything but Aeyr, Farquad hear screaming We surmize that they are hallucinating We take a third point of exhaustion We finally come out of the water passage and are at a small lake.

item.title: 022-20230301-FightWithHag
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session At our 4th day in the cave. Shit goes down, we break the statue, a woman comes out, Fiona yells HAG and starts blasting it.

item.title: 021-20230222-UndergroundLake
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We are camped out at the lake underground, waiting for the water to recede so that we can escape.

item.title: 020-20230208-PostGrubFight
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session We fought the mother grub. She couldn’t quite reach us do to narrow spots in the cave.

item.title: 019-20230201-GrubFight
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session We entered the mine. Explored it a bit, found an undergrown lake. Triggered a trap and caused a cave in.

item.title: 018-20230125-AtTheMines
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log We had into the mine #lyzas_tears . We see some tracks, some abandoned equipment and some bodies

item.title: 017-20230111-PostDealWithMarys
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log After dealing with Marys and letting her go. We head back to town

item.title: 016-20221221-DealWithMarys
item.description: Session Summary We make a deal with Marys to deal with the Black spyder group Recap of Last Session We talk to Sildar and find out that the goblin problem is getting worse so he was heading out of town to try to get help from another Lords of Alliance outpost.

item.title: 015-20221216-InPhandalin
item.description: Session Summary We talk to Sildar and find out that the goblin problem is getting worse, so he was heading out of town to try to get help from another Lords of Alliance outpost.

item.title: 014-20221123-Skeleton_Fight
item.description: Session Summary We fight the skeleton and destroy it after lifting it into the air where it couldn’t really attack us.

item.title: 013-20221116-PostBreak
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session We fight the owner of the bar #Marys and her hoodlums. we beat up her hoods and capture her with the silencing amulet We level up

item.title: 012-20221012-Post_Hidden_Cave
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Fiona and I meet back up with the rest of the group in a room at the top of a tower.

item.title: 011-20221005-Hidden_Cave_Part3
item.description: Session Summary Fiona and I meet back up with the rest of the group in a room at the top of a tower.

item.title: 010-20220831-Hidden_Cave_Party_split
item.description: Session Summary Fiona and I enter a room with a dragon statue. We take our sweet ass time and finally figure out how to manuver parts of the statue to open a secret passage under the altar.

item.title: 009-20220824-Hidden_Cave_fight
item.description: Session Summary We enter combat with the guards and destroy them, however they are able to alert more guards before we knock them out.

item.title: 008-20220817-Post_Goblin_Save
item.description: Session Summary After saving [[DnD/World/People/Ilk]] we proceed to investigate the underground cave network. We find a hidden door that looks like it may have been there before the current occupants of the cave took over for their own nefarious dealings.

item.title: 007-20220718-Goblin_Bard_Rescue
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session [[DnD/Sessions/006-20220713-phandalin]] We do some shopping in [[Phandalin]] where we make friends with the shopkeepers of the oddities store #spelunkin .

item.title: 006-20220713-phandalin
item.description: Session Summary We do some shopping in [[Phandalin]] where we make friends with the shopkeepers of the oddities store #spelunkin .

item.title: 005-20220706-Goblin_Cave_Fight
item.description: Summary We defeat [[Clarg]] and offer him a clean death for information. He says that the only name he will give us is [[Cragma]] which we don’t know if it’s a place or a person.

item.title: 004-2022-622-Goblin_Cave
item.description: Summary We interogate the remaining goblin and free the prisoner who turns out to be [[Sildar]] and learn about the map the [[DnD/World/People/Gundrin]] had to the [[Wave_Echo_Cave]].

item.title: 003-20220608-After_Ambush
item.description: Summary We find a cave and sign which leads us to believe that Gundrin and his companions were takin prisoner. We enter free some Wolves, kill some goblins and find the prisoners.

item.title: 002-20220525-Island
item.description: Session Summary We have arrived in what at first appears to be an abandonded town on this small island. However, on closer inspection we find one building that is occupied by a dwarf [[DnD/World/People/Sorin]] .

item.title: 001-20220518-Intro
item.description: Summary I am traveling on a boat with 4 other passangers when the boat shipwrecks and the capitan leaves us. We band together and get a rough raft built and escape the sinking ship.
A magical forge. Rumor has it that it is located inside the [[DnD/World/Places/Wave_Echo_Cave]]
Meta Race: Job: Boss: Companion: Status: Notes #lyzas_tears East of town This is the first cave we entered the miners started a cave inn trying to trap the goblins

item.description: Player: Sydney Race: Half-Elf Class: Druid

item.description: Meta Town where we all left barkeep: Tomlin

item.title: Clarg
item.description: Meta Race: #BugBear Job: Boss of the goblins Boss: Companion: Status: Dead - killed by Tia Notes Boss of the goblins.

item.title: Cragma
item.description: Meta Unkown. A place or person mentioned by [[Clarg]] before Tia killed him.

item.description: Meta Race: Halfling Job: Assistent to Marys Boss: #Marys Companion: Status: Alive Notes

item.description: Player: Aerin

item.title: Fiona
item.description: Player: Dory Imune to charm half rest is the same as full rest

item.title: Forge of Spells
item.description: Meta This is a magical item. Assumed to be a blacksmith’s forge (at least that’s the assumption based on the name).

item.title: Gundrin Rockseaker
item.description: Meta Race: Dwarf Job: Boss: Companion: [[Sildar]], Status: unkown Notes captured by the goblins taken to Crevmare Castle Was carrying a map to [[Wave_Echo_Cave]]

item.title: Ilk
item.description: Meta Race: Goblin Job: Bard Boss: #hidden_giants_toe barkeep Companion: Status: Alive Notes A goblin bard that was enslaved at the #hidden_giants_toe .

item.title: Marys
item.description: Meta Race: Half-Drow Job: Boss of the Knights of the Void Boss: Unkown Status: Alive and captured by us Mary’s is the owner of the [[DnD/World/Groups/Knights of the Void]] .

item.description: Meta Town we were all originally heading towards

item.title: Phandalin

item.title: Sorin Winterhill
item.description: Meta Name: Sorin Winterhill Race: Dwarf Job: Barkeep, Brewer Status: Alive Fears: Water Notes Barkeep, owner, and brewer of the lone inn on bloody beach.

item.title: The Sword Coast North
item.description: The Sword Coast North is comprised a rough landscape of rugged hills, precarious mountain ranges and dense forests, it was home to several like-minded towns and cities.

item.title: Tia
item.description: Meta Player: Tyler Race: Half-Orc Class: Rogue Backstory Tia comes from an ancient clan of assasins from a small village in a hidden valley.

item.title: Triadmore
item.description: north of phandolin

item.title: Wave Echo Cave
item.description: Originally map was carried by #Gundrin . There is a legend that the Forge of Spells is burried in the cave
